org.vanilladb.core.sql

Class Constant

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.sql.Constant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Constant>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigIntConstant, DoubleConstant, IntegerConstant, VarcharConstant

    public abstract class Constant
extends Object
implements Comparable<Constant>
    An abstract class that denotes a value of a supported type.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Constant()

      Returns the Java object corresponding to this constant.

      Casts this constant to the specified type.

      Constructs a new instance of the specified type with default value.
      abstract Constant div(Constant c)
      Divides this constant by a value specified by another constant.

      Multiplies this constant by a value specified by another constant.

      • Constant

        public Constant()

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static Constant newInstance(Type type,
                                   byte[] val)
        Constructs a new instance of the specified type with value converted from the input byte array.
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        val - the byte array contains the value
        Returns:
        a constant of specified type with value converted from the byte array

      • defaultInstance

        public static Constant defaultInstance(Type type)
        Constructs a new instance of the specified type with default value. For all numeric constants, the default value is 0; for string constants, the default value is an empty string.
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        Returns:
        the constant of specified type with default value

      • getType

        public abstract Type getType()
        Returns the type corresponding to this constant.
        Returns:
        the type of the constant

      • asJavaVal

        public abstract Object asJavaVal()
        Returns the Java object corresponding to this constant.
        Returns:
        the Java value of the constant

      • asBytes

        public abstract byte[] asBytes()
        Returns the byte array corresponding to this constant value.
        Returns:
        the byte array of the constant

      • size

        public abstract int size()
        Return the number of bytes required to encode this constant.
        Returns:
        the size of the this constant

      • castTo

        public abstract Constant castTo(Type type)
        Casts this constant to the specified type. Does not support casting from a string constant to a numeric constant.
        Parameters:
        type - the type the caller intends to cast to
        Returns:
        the constant casted to the specified type

      • add

        public abstract Constant add(Constant c)
        Adds this constant a value specified by another constant. Does not support adding value to a string constant. Automatic type upgrade will be done during the arithmetic.
        Parameters:
        c - constant whose value will be added
        Returns:
        a constant with value equals to the sum of the value of this constant and another constant

      • sub

        public abstract Constant sub(Constant c)
        Subtracts a value specified by another constant from this constant. Does not support adding value to a string constant. Automatic type upgrade will be done during the arithmetic.
        Parameters:
        c - constant whose value will be substracted from
        Returns:
        a constant with value equals to the value of this constant subtracted from that of another constant

      • mul

        public abstract Constant mul(Constant c)
        Multiplies this constant by a value specified by another constant. Does not support adding value to a string constant. Automatic type upgrade will be done during the arithmetic.
        Parameters:
        c - multiplier
        Returns:
        a constant with value equals to the value of this constant multiplied by that of another constant

      • div

        public abstract Constant div(Constant c)
        Divides this constant by a value specified by another constant. Does not support adding value to a string constant. Automatic type upgrade will be done during the arithmetic.
        Parameters:
        c - divider
        Returns:
        a constant with value equals to the value of this constant divided by that of another constant
